item.description:
üöÄDeploying Mistral-7B RAG to Production

Join our friends at @AIMakerspace to learn how to go from prototype to production with LangServe and Mistral 7B!

Will cover LCEL, HuggingFace, LangServe, LangSmith

This Thursday, 10am PST

Link: https://lu.ma/Mistral7BRAG

item.title: RT üë®‚Äçüè´ü§ñ Greg Loughnane: Re @LangChainAI + @MistralAI = the #LLMOps you need! Join us this week!

RT‚ÄÇüë®‚Äçüè´ü§ñ Greg Loughnane
Re @LangChainAI + @MistralAI = the #LLMOps you need!

Join us this week!


AI Makerspace:‚ÄÇJoin us live to learn how to go from prototype to production with LangServe and Mistral 7B!

üì¶ Learn how to easily deploy @LangChainAI prototypes and leverage top embeddings from @huggingface. Discover LangServe's power in simplifying deployment.

RSVP: https://lu.ma/Mistral7BRAG

item.title: RT Momento: Always love these shoutout threads from @Hacubu spotlighting @LangChainAI contributors. Especially love seeing @mlonml (& the whole team!)...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇMomento
Always love these shoutout threads from @Hacubu spotlighting @LangChainAI contributors. Especially love seeing @mlonml (& the whole team!) getting recognized for continued enhancements to Momento Vector Index. üíö


Jacob Lee:‚ÄÇ@mlonml for adding maximal marginal relevance search to the @momentohq vectorstore

Njuelle for adding streaming support to our @Github loader

luiz-k-alencar for fixing a typo in our docs

(5/15)
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Jo Kristian Bergum: The retriever abstraction in @LangChainAI is üî• Super easy to define custom retrievers, like in this example where we demonst...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJo Kristian Bergum
The retriever abstraction in @LangChainAI is üî•

Super easy to define custom retrievers, like in this example where we demonstrate user level sharding with Vespa streaming mode!


Harrison Chase:‚ÄÇA great article by @jobergum

@vespaengine is super powerful and has a lot of knobs that don't fit neatly into LangChain's idea of a vectorstore

This is exactly why we introduced the Retriever abstraction earlier this year - great to see how easy it is to implement a custom one
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Harrison Chase: A great article by @jobergum @vespaengine is super powerful and has a lot of knobs that don't fit neatly into LangChain's idea of a...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇHarrison Chase
A great article by @jobergum

@vespaengine is super powerful and has a lot of knobs that don't fit neatly into LangChain's idea of a vectorstore

This is exactly why we introduced the Retriever abstraction earlier this year - great to see how easy it is to implement a custom one


LangChain:‚ÄÇ‚ö°Ô∏èTurbocharge RAG with LangChain and Vespa Streaming Mode for Sharded Data

@vespaengine's streaming search solution enables you to efficiently search over sharded data - perfect for when you want to store data grouped by user id

@jobergum wrote a great article (complete with‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1734252293233791195

item.title: RT Git Maxd: Had a great day getting to know @lancedb - sick little OSS DB that stores vectors, metadata and multi-modal data (text, images, videos, e...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇGit Maxd
Had a great day getting to know @lancedb - sick little OSS DB that stores vectors, metadata and multi-modal data (text, images, videos, etc).

Super simple integration with ü¶ú @LangChainAI and support for Python and Javascript/Typescript.

Ingest anything. Rust at its core.‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1734106468717371791
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: Time for some @LangChainAI JS/TS contributor thank yous! BTW: We've been cooking up some ambitious changes, so apologies for slower than...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJacob Lee
Time for some @LangChainAI JS/TS contributor thank yous!

BTW: We've been cooking up some ambitious changes, so apologies for slower than usual reviews the past few weeks. Huge thanks to:

@tsukasa_oishi for a vital fix for prompts created from large numbers of messages

(1/15)

item.description:
RT‚ÄÇRoger Taylor
Analyzing RAG Methods: Semantic Similarity vs. Full Document Prompting.
Ingrid Stevens uses @LangchainAI to compare traditional #RAG using embeddings/vector stores to alternative "prompt stuffing" directly inputting full transcription, code link insideüëâ https://buff.ly/3RAyIBc
